bibl.title: Berenike 1995. Preliminary Report of the 1995 Excavations at Berenike (Egyptian Red Sea Coast) and the Survey of the Eastern Desert.
bibl.biblScope: tabl., figg., cartes, plans et 2 cartes dépl. h. t.
bibl.note: Pp. 197-203: 8. Greek and Latin Texts, by A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT. Edition of O. Berenike Inv. 3273-A. Receipt, Ist century B.C. - Pp. 357-409: 21. Survey of the Hinterland, by S.E. SIDEBOTHAM and R.E. ZITTERKOPF. Graffiti (2 in Latin, 1 in Greek). - Greek inscriptions from Bir 'Iayyan, forthcoming in ChrEg 71 (1996) No. 142.

bibl.title: Colin Adams
bibl.note: C.R. par Colin Adams, JHS 119 (1999) pp. 218-219 [concerne aussi: Steven E. SIDEBOTHAM and Willemina Z. WENDRICH (Edd.), Berenike 1994 (Leiden, 1995)].

bibl.title: Valerie Maxfield
